nodes.text: The Battle of Vulcusion was a battle in which Sergeant Frumm participated. Frumm's actions during the battle earned him the title of hero of Vulcusion.

The Battle of Vulcusion was first mentioned in the the Star Wars Roleplaying Game Saga Edition supplement book Galaxy at War, which was written for Wizards of the Coast by Daniel Wallace in 2009. The battle is mentioned only as part of Frumm's title in the attribution for a quote by the sergeant regarding Lightning Squadron, and neither the era it takes place in, nor the location or parties involved, are revealed. The Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion, which Wallace also worked on with Jason Fry, revealed that the Vulcusion system was a star system in the Vulcusion sector, but made no specific connection between the battle and the system or its sector beyond their shared name.
